# +(_:_:)

**Operator**

Creates a column by adding each element in the first column to the corresponding element in the second column.

## Declaration

```swift
static func + (a: MLUntypedColumn, b: MLUntypedColumn) -> MLUntypedColumn
```

## Parameters

- **a**: A column.
- **b**: A column.

## Return Value

A new column if the columns have the same size and underlying type; otherwise an invalid column.

## Combining columns

- **-(_:_:)**: Creates a column by subtracting each element in the second column from the corresponding element in the first column.
- ***(_:_:)**: Creates a column by multiplying each element in the first column by the corresponding element in the second column.
- **/(_:_:)**: Creates a column by dividing each element in the first column by the corresponding element in the second column.

items.description: Creates a column by subtracting each element in the second column from the corresponding element in the first column.
